typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceStaging
source(output(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceTarget
source(output(
		MaxSurrogateKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select isNull(max(product_key),0) as MaxSurrogateKey from dbo.product_dim',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> MaxSurrogateKey
sourceStaging, sourceTarget exists(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsForUpdate
ExistsForUpdate, sourceTarget lookup(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductKeyAddedDateLookup
ProductKeyAddedDateLookup derive(updated_date = currentTimestamp(),
		is_active = 0) ~> UpdatedDateDerivedColumn
UpdatedDateDerivedColumn alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateAlterRow
sourceStaging, sourceTarget exists(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InsertNewRecordExists
InsertNewRecordExists, MaxSurrogateKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForSurrogateKeyNew
SurrogateKeyCalculation derive(product_key = MaxSurrogateKey+s_key,
		added_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumns
JoinForSurrogateKeyNew keyGenerate(output(s_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCalculation
ExistsForUpdate, MaxSurrogateKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinforSurrogateKeyExisting
JoinforSurrogateKeyExisting keyGenerate(output(s_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCalculationExisting
SurrogateKeyCalculationExisting derive(product_key = MaxSurrogateKey+s_key,
		added_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumnExisting
UpdateAlterRow sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['product_id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id = sourceStaging@product_id,
		is_active,
		start_date,
		end_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateSink
DerivedColumns sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		start_date = added_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewsink
DerivedColumnExisting sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		start_date = added_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertExistingProduct
